website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a quality road bike for a confident rider, this is a sound option. Otherwise, we recommend the Kent for quality and value.
pros: Offers a sturdy yet lightweight aluminum frame and 24-inch wheels
Its 21 speeds and reliable hand brakes are ideal for road riding
cons: It's the most expensive bike we tested, and it's intended for a more practiced rider
Assembly by a professional is recommended

customer_reviews.title: Great kids road bike
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 12 yr old son who had a hard time keeping up with us on the road with his mountain bike. Now he fly's and loves it. He can climb hills better too. He's crashed it three times getting used to it and the bike came out fine each time. We both wish it had the added brake handles at the bar, which I could add on. The bike was easy to build, shifts very well, even months later.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Hajnal

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for my body habitus and my short legs fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 25-30 yrs old but I weigh 135lb and am 4'10. So i needed a bike that was fit for a small woman and decided after much research (measuring my limbs/height, etc) decided to settle on this bike. It is perfect for my body habitus and my short legs fit perfectly with each rotation of the foot pedal, which was a concern of mine on the larger woman frame bikes. I like to cruise around this bike for a couple a miles and it's comfortable and very easy to put together! Also the white/pink design is very cute! I may change out the seat later as after a few miles it becomes a bit uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Goonie

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike
customer_reviews.text: This bike is very light and attractive. It is a girls bike but since I am a very short female the womans version is too big for me. It rides smooth and quite. The breaks could be a little better and I just wish that the handle bars could be adjusted upward a little. But other than that, the bike was worth the money. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: kittiggy

customer_reviews.title: Keep the box!!

We tried to get parts to replace but the only option is to return the bike which is going to be a big pain in the butt. I will not buy another large item like this from Amazon again.

product_meta.title: Giordano Libero 1.6 Road Bike (24-Inch Wheels)
product_meta.description: Good things come in small packages and the 24-inch Libero is no exception. This beautifully made, hand crafted, lightweight 6061 aluminum frame is the foundation for this well thought out road bike for youngsters. The 24-inch Libero features Shimano Claris 16 Speed STI shifters and derailleurs matched to an aluminum road crank. Light weight and strong aluminum 24inch wheels and 1 3/8-inch tires round out this impressive package. Perfect for boys and girls looking to start riding early. Available in boy’s 41 cm and girl’s 36.5 cm frames.Lightweight hand crafted 6061 aluminum frame 24" Alloy Rims,1 1/8" Threadless stem, 16-speed Shimano drive train, Dual water bottle mounts, Professional Assembly is recommended for your safety and riding enjoyment
feature_bullets: Boy's Red/White - fits riders 4'7"-5'0" with an inseam of 26"-29".
